Summary: Silent steady moving, too bright for twilight hour than any thing I have ever seen. Some radiant shimmering.
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked up at the north sky from my yard and seen an unusually bright light in the sky and mentioned to my wife how bright it was for twilight. Then I said I could hear an engine running. Then again I thought that it was a motorcycle passing, and after the motorcycle had passed the object was silent as it passed with no noise at all. We watched it for about what seemed to be 2 minutes. It was heading south east at a steady rate until out of sight. It was very bright for twilight. With some shimmering. I have spent many hour of my life watching the sky and have never before seen anything like this. I have seen meteors, space station, comets, northern lights, and satelites. But nothing like this.
